mapper.select: select r.realtorName,r.realtorPhone,r.realtorEmail, o.rooms,o.bathrooms, l.parking,l.parkingCost,l.addrDetail,l.yearly_monthly, w.deposit,w.deposit_web,w.monthlyFee,w.monthlyFee_web, j.yearlyFee,j.yearlyFee_web from visitorreserv u join realtor r on u.realtorId = r.realtorId join roominfo o on u.itemId = o.itemId join listing l on u.itemId = l.itemId join WOLSELISTING w on u.itemId = w.itemId join JUNSAELISTING j on u.itemId = j.itemId where u.userId = #{userId}
select realtorname,realtorphone,realtoraddr from realtor where realtoraddr like '%'|| #{city} ||'%' ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE
